price: "Kuma lalle nĩ, na ji tsõron* dangi a bãyãna, kuma mãtãta ta kasance bakarãriya! Sai ka bã ni wani mataimaki daga wajenKa."
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا
footnotes: * Amfãnin sãmu ɗã ga mutumin kirki shi ne dõmin ya gãji kirkin kuma ya taimaki sauran danginsa, ya rãyar da gida. Kuma wanda ba mutumin kirki ba yana yiwuwa ya sãmi ɗan kirki mai shiryar da shi zuwa ga hanyar ƙwarai.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
